[Dialog]Now then, let us begin the lesson.

In this session, we shall discuss the game's
help system.

During battle, you may wish to know the
meaning of a command, the effects of an
ability, or the range of a weapon.
Just select the command, ability, or
item with the cursor and press SELECT.{END}

A help message like the previous one
will appear.

There are help messages for a wide
variety of features in the game.

So, if you require additional help on
a subject, first try pressing SELECT.

Let us try researching the effects
of a spell.{END}

If you press SELECT before using an ability,
you may check its effects or range.

Let's examine some of the abbreviations
used in the help messages.

[Portrait]Range[Dialog] is the attack range.
[Portrait]Radius[Dialog] is the radius of the area of effect.
[Portrait]MP[Dialog] is the number of MP consumed.
[Portrait]Speed[Dialog] is the ability's Speed attribute.
 means that the magick may be reflected
by the Reflect ability.
"Arithmeticks" indicates a spell that may be
used with arithmeticks.

[Portrait]Removes[Dialog] indicates status effects that
the ability removes.
[Portrait]Effect[Dialog] is the inflicted status effect.
Also, the range or radius of an ability may
be limited vertically. This is indicated by
"Vert." followed by a number.
This value represents the vertical reach.


Try using the help system to view information
about this unit's spells. Press START when
you are finished.{END}

The help system is especially useful for
checking the details of abilities or status
effects during battle.
Just remember that should you find anything
you do not understand, you can select it with
the cursor and press SELECT for help.
With that, I shall bring this lesson to a close.{END}
